4 #include "leica_scanstation_utils/LeicaUtils.h"

6 #include <CADToPointCloud.h>
7 
8 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> PointCloudXYZ;
9 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> PointCloudRGB;
10 
11 std::string TARGET_CLOUD_TOPIC = "/cad/cloud";
12 std::string SOURCE_CLOUD_TOPIC = "/scan/cloud";
13 int FREQ = 1; // Hz
14 
15 sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 g_cloud_msg, g_cadcloud_msg;
16 
17 int getCADCloud(std::string file_name)
18 {
19  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud(new PointCloudRGB);
20  CADToPointCloud cad2pc = CADToPointCloud(LeicaUtils::getFilePath(file_name, ""), cloud);
21 
22  if (Utils::isValidCloud(cloud))
23  {
24  Utils::colorizeCloud(cloud, 0, 0, 255); // cad cloud is blue
25  Utils::cloudToROSMsg(cloud, g_cadcloud_msg);
26  ROS_INFO("Received cad cloud");
27  }
28  else
29  {
30  ROS_ERROR("Couldn't read file %s", file_name.c_str());
31  return -1;
32  }
33 
34  return 0;
35 }
36 
37 int getScanCloud(std::string file_name)
38 {
39  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud(new PointCloudRGB);
40 
41  std::string f = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(file_name, ".pcd");
42  ROS_INFO("Converting file: %s", f.c_str());
43  int r = pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(f, *cloud);
44 
45  if (r != -1 && Utils::isValidCloud(cloud))
46  {
47  Utils::colorizeCloud(cloud, 255, 0, 128); // scanned cloud is pink
48  Utils::cloudToROSMsg(cloud, g_cloud_msg);
49  ROS_INFO("Received scanned cloud");
50  }
51  else
52  {
53  ROS_ERROR("Couldn't read file %s", f.c_str());
54  return -1;
55  }
56 
57  return 0;
58 }
59 
60 bool serviceCb(leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Request& req,
61  leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Response& res)
62 {
63  ROS_INFO("Request to publish clouds");
64 
65  int r = getScanCloud(req.file_name);
66  if (r == 0)
67  {
68  r = getCADCloud(req.file_name + ".obj");
69  ROS_INFO("Publishing clouds on topics: \n\t%s \n\t%s", TARGET_CLOUD_TOPIC.c_str(), SOURCE_CLOUD_TOPIC.c_str());
70  }
71 
72  res.message = "Finished service to receive cloud";
73  res.success = r == -1 ? false : true;
74 
75  return true;
76 }
77 
78 int main(int argc, char** argv)
79 {
80  ros::init(argc, argv, "cloud_publisher");
81  ros::NodeHandle nh;
82 
83  std::string pointcloud_folder_path;
84  if (!nh.getParam("/pointcloud_folder", pointcloud_folder_path))
85  {
86  ROS_ERROR("No pointcloud folder path on Param Server");
87  return 0;
88  }
89  LeicaUtils::setPointCloudPath(pointcloud_folder_path);
90  ROS_INFO("Search for pointcloud in %s", pointcloud_folder_path.c_str());
91 
92  ros::ServiceServer service = nh.advertiseService("publish_clouds", serviceCb);
93  ros::Publisher pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("scan/cloud", 1);
94  ros::Publisher cad_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("cad/cloud", 1);
95 
96  ROS_INFO("Service waiting for call to /publish_clouds");
97 
98  ros::Rate r(FREQ);
99  while (ros::ok())
100  {
101  if (Utils::isValidCloudMsg(g_cloud_msg) && Utils::isValidCloudMsg(g_cadcloud_msg))
102  {
103  pub.publish(g_cloud_msg);
104  cad_pub.publish(g_cadcloud_msg);
105  }
106  ros::spinOnce();
107  r.sleep();
108  }
109 
110  return 0;
111 }
